v1.headline: The CEO Whisperer | Helping Tech & Manufacturing Leaders Build Bold Visions, Aligned Teams & Sustainable Growth
v1.about:
Most leaders I meet are exhausted. They’re carrying the weight of relentless change, disengaged staff, silos, global competition, and constant firefighting.

I know what that feels like. I’ve built multimillion-dollar businesses, led cultural turnarounds, and consulted across tech, food, and manufacturing. What made the difference every time wasn’t the latest strategy or KPI dashboard. It was vision.

Vision changes everything. It gives leaders clarity, energises teams, dissolves silos, and sets the stage for sustainable performance. That’s why today I’m Co-Founder of Positive Leaders Training Company alongside Sandra Duarte. Together we embed the Leader7™ Framework so leaders stop firefighting and start leading.

WHAT WE DO:

We help CEOs, owners, and leadership teams design bold visions, align their people, and embed the future skills they need to thrive. Our frameworks — Vision7™, Team7™, Skills7™ — are practical, proven, and regenerative. They don’t sit on a shelf. They shift behaviour.

WHO WE WORK WITH:

•	CEOs & GMs under pressure to deliver in complex markets
•	Executive teams drained by culture and retention issues
•	Middle managers overwhelmed by change and undertraining
•	Boards preparing for the next five years of disruption

Our clients include household names, ASX-listed companies, and global brands, as well as ambitious challengers determined to stay ahead.

WHY IT WORKS:

Firefighting keeps you alive. Vision makes you unstoppable.
We’ve been CEOs, founders, and consultants. We’ve earned the scars, the wins, and the perspective that only comes from doing the work. Our approach blends bold strategy with people-first leadership, so leaders inspire, teams align, and culture becomes a competitive advantage.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT:

•	No corporate theatre. No endless slides.
•	You get us (not juniors), straight talk, and practical tools you can use immediately.
•	We measure what matters: engagement, retention, trust, growth, profit.
•	We only work with a limited number of clients each year so we can stay hands-on.

OUR RESULTS:

Leaders who lead with confidence. Teams who own outcomes. Businesses that grow with clarity and vision.

READY TO TALK?

If you’re ready to stop firefighting and start leading with vision, let’s talk. Connect with me here or at www.positiveleaderstraining.com.

When leaders rise, everyone rises.
